N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9720.6 - Request for a fair hearing

State Regulations
(a) Any
clear communication to the department by or on behalf of an applicant or
participant requesting review of a contractor's determination after a
reconsideration shall constitute a request for a fair hearing if made within 60
days of the written determination after reconsideration. (b) A fair hearing may be requested in
writing, by telephone or in person. (1)

Telephone requests should be made to the toll-free telephone number specified
by the contractor in the notice of determination after
reconsideration. (2)

Written
requests should be made to the department by writing: Fair Hearing Section
EPIC
P.O. Box 1930

Albany, NY 12201
